==Trivia==
===Etymology===
* Zulqarnain comes from the Arabic {{Lang|''{{w|Dhu al-Qarnayn}}''|ar=ذُو ٱلْقَرْنَيْن}}, which means "Two-horned." 
** Dhu al-Qarnayn is a character in the Quran that sets up a barrier  between a certain people and {{w|Gog and Magog}} (called Ya'juj and Ma'juj)
** He built one of the most important and powerful dams ever; a dam made of iron and copper instead of the traditional materials used such as bricks and stone. This dam was made to help a weak and defenseless group of people against the transgressing Gog and Magog.
